tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.1: §6Fully absorbs the damage of one attack, and then shatters
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.2: §6The shield takes %1$s§6 second(s) to repair itself
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.2: §6Increases movement speed by %1$s§b%%§6 when in a light level of %2$s§6 or less
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.3: §6Prevents activation of Sculk Sensors from walking or falling short distances
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.duality_rings.1: §dIncreases the effectiveness of Magic Garlic Bread
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.friendly_fire_f: §6Absorbs fire damage at the cost of durability, and recovers durability over time
§6Upon running out of durability, takes %1$s§6 seconds to begin restoring durability again
text.config.chromaticarsenal.title: Chromatic Arsenal Config
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.COMM: Golden Heart Duration
The duration of the Golden Heart's Absorption effect, in ticks. The effect is refreshed after this many ticks pass.
Golden Heart Amplifier
The amplifier of the Golden Heart's Absorption effect.
Glass Shield Cooldown
After blocking a hit, it will take the Glass Shield this many ticks to recover.
Ward Crystal Incoming Multiplier
Magic damage received while wearing a Ward Crystal is multiplied by this value.
Ward Crystal Outgoing Multiplier
Magic damage dealt while wearing a Ward Crystal is multiplied by this value.
Shadow Treads Max Light Level
The highest possible light level in which the Shadow Treads' effect will activate. Note that very low values may not function as expected.
Shadow Treads Speed Modifier
The speed increase caused by the Shadow Treads' effect. 0.2 is equal to +20%%.
Duality Rings Damage Multiplier
The multiplier given to projectile attacks when the attacker is wearing Duality Rings.
Duality Rings Strength Duration
The duration of the Duality Rings' Strength effect, in ticks. This is applied when consuming Magic Garlic Bread.
Duality Rings Strength Amplifier
The amplifier of the Duality Rings' Strength effect.
Duality Rings Health Boost Duration
The duration of the Duality Rings' Health Boost effect, in ticks. This is applied when consuming Magic Garlic Bread.
Duality Rings Health Boost Amplifier
The amplifier of the Duality Rings' Health Boost effect.
Friendly Fire Flower Recovery Time
The duration, in ticks, that it takes for the Friendly Fire Flower to recover one point of durability. This can be halved by standing in powder snow.
Friendly Fire Flower Overheat Cooldown
The duration, in ticks, that it takes for the Friendly Fire Flower to begin recovering durability after taking too much fire damage.
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.CLIE: Whenever ticks are converted to seconds in a tooltip, the decimal is kept if the resulting amount of seconds is under this value.
